text: Wilfried Achiel Emma Martens (19 April 1936 â€“ 9 October 2013) was a Belgian politician. He was born in Sleidinge (East Flanders). During his political career, Martens served as the Prime Minister of Belgium from 3 April 1979 to 6 April 1981 and 17 December 1981 to 7 March 1992. Martens, who had pancreatic cancer, died by euthanasia on 9 October 2013, at his home in Lokeren. He was 77. ==References== ==Other websites== *EPP President's page Category:1936 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Belgian Roman Catholics Category:Christelijke Volkspartij politicians Category:Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams politicians Category:Deaths by euthanasia Category:Flemish politicians Category:Government ministers of Belgium Category:Harvard University alumni Category:MEPs for Belgium Category:People from East Flanders Category:Prime ministers of Belgium
title: Wilfried Martens
